statements: SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, status FROM waste_reduction_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, initiative_name, status FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT end_date, supplier_id, initiative_name, status FROM waste_reduction_initiatives ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT supplier_id, initiative_name, start_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE end_date < CURDATE();
SELECT supplier_id, initiative_name FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE initiative_name LIKE '%recycling%' ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM Supplier;
SELECT supplier_name FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Initiative ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM Supplier JOIN Initiative ON Supplier.supplier_id = Initiative.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM Supplier WHERE waste_reduction_initiatives IS NOT NULL
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS num_initiatives FROM Supplier INNER JOIN Initiative ON Supplier.supplier_id = Initiative.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%eco%'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'California';
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_logs WHERE waste_reduction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_metric_name, waste_reduction_metric_value FROM suppliers INNER JOIN waste_reduction_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = waste_reduction_metrics.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiatives FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'California';
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_metric_name, waste_reduction_metric_value FROM suppliers JOIN waste_reduction_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = waste_reduction_metrics.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_metric_name, waste_reduction_metric_value FROM suppliers JOIN waste_reduction_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = waste_reduction_metrics.supplier_id ORDER BY waste_reduction_metric_value DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_metric_name, waste_reduction_metric_value FROM suppliers JOIN waste_reduction_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = waste_reduction_metrics.supplier_id WHERE waste_reduction_metric_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM Initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, description FROM WasteCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';

SELECT supplier_name, category_name, weight_kg FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierWasteTracking ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierWasteTracking.supplier_id JOIN WasteCategories ON SupplierWasteTracking.category_id = WasteCategories.category_id;
SELECT supplier_name, start_date, end_date FROM Initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionSuppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, waste_reduction_initiative FROM WasteReductionSuppliers;
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionSuppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE LENGTH(waste_reduction_initiative) > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' OR waste_reduction_initiative IS NOT NULL
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, LENGTH(waste_reduction_initiative) AS initiative_length FROM WasteReductionSuppliers ORDER BY initiative_length DESC, supplier_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(supplier_id) AS supplier_count, AVG(LENGTH(waste_reduction_initiative)) AS avg_initiative_length FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_name <> 'XYZ Ltd'
